text: A protest is when a number of people come together in public to show others that they strongly like or dislike a social condition or a government policy. For example, some people protest racism or war. There are many ways in which people can protest. Protesters can do things like write letters, not eat food, sing songs, or riot. ==Related pages== * Demonstration * Protestant * Self- immolation * Sit-in * Social movement Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Protest
